queryMap.query: SELECT GRP_CD FROM TBEA_GRP_CD WHERE GRP_CD = ?
SELECT GRP_CD , GRP_NM , RMK , DEL_YN , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM FROM TBEA_GRP_CD WHERE DEL_YN = ? AND GRP_NM LIKE '%' || NVL(?, GRP_NM) || '%' ORDER BY GRP_CD
SELECT CD FROM TBEA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = ? AND CD = ?

SELECT A.GRP_CD , A.CD , A.CD_NM , A.RMK , decode(A.DEL_YN, 'Y', '미사용', 'N', '사용') del_yn , A.INST_ID , A.INST_DTM , A.UPDT_ID , A.UPDT_DTM , B.GRP_NM , A.SORT_ODR , A.RMK2 FROM TBEA_SPEC_CD A , TBEA_GRP_CD B WHERE A.GRP_CD = B.GRP_CD AND A.GRP_CD = ?

INSERT INTO TBEA_GRP_CD ( GRP_CD , GRP_NM , DEL_YN , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM , RMK ) VALUES ( ? -- GRP_CD , ? -- GRP_NM , ? -- DEL_YN , ? -- INST_ID , SYSDATE -- INST_DTM , ? -- UPDT_ID , SYSDATE -- UPDT_DTM , ? -- RMK )
UPDATE TBEA_GRP_CD SET GRP_NM = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE , RMK = ? WHERE GRP_CD = ?
UPDATE TBEA_GRP_CD SET DEL_YN = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE GRP_CD = ?

INSERT INTO TBEA_SPEC_CD ( GRP_CD , CD , CD_NM , DEL_YN , INST_ID , INST_DTM , UPDT_ID , UPDT_DTM , RMK , SORT_ODR , RMK2 ) VALUES ( ? -- GRP_CD , ? -- CD , ? -- CD_NM , ? -- DEL_YN , ? -- INST_ID , SYSDATE -- INST_DTM , ? -- UPDT_ID , SYSDATE -- UPDT_DTM , ? -- RMK , ? -- SORT_ODR , ? -- RMK2 )
UPDATE TBEA_SPEC_CD SET CD_NM = ? , DEL_YN = ? , UPDT_ID = ? , UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE , RMK = ? , SORT_ODR = ? , RMK2 = ? WHERE GRP_CD = ? AND CD = ?
DELETE FROM TBEA_SPEC_CD WHERE GRP_CD = ? AND CD = ?
